member.name: ISyncMgrSessionCreator.CreateSession
member.summary: Notifies Sync Center that synchronization of the specified items has begun.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the unique ID of the handler. This string is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.

The address of a pointer to a buffer containing an array of item IDs, managed by the handler specified in pszHandlerID, to be synchronized. Each ID is of maximum length MAX_SYNCMGR_ID including the terminating null character.
The number of item IDs contained in the buffer referenced in ppszItemIDs.
The address of a pointer to an instance of used to report progress and events. This value can be NULL if no callback is needed.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrSessionCreator
member.summary: Exposes a single method through which a handler or external application can notify Sync Center that synchronization has begun, as well as report progress and events.
